title: The algorithm‚Ä¶
text:
It‚Äôs kinda limiting when you can‚Äôt directly train your personal tracking algorithm. With AI available trained to scam people, you would think someone would make it available to provide an honest, productive, cost effective, relationship between advertisers and consumers. title: One tiny thing (Playback Speed)

title: G suite

title: IDK
text: Update causes app to no longer recognize Apple lightening digital a/v adapter. Now my phone will only do screen mirroring (it used to automatically switch it to AirPlay mode), which I personally would not mind, except that for some reason, i can no longer play a playlist if I am using my adapter. The app will play one video and then stop, even though I am supposed to be playing a playlist. I am not talking about auto play. I am referring to a playlist. And auto play does not work with playlists ‚Äî because it is a playlist. I used to be able to plug in my adapter, shuffle a playlist and go on about my day with my phone playing video after video. Now, I use my adapter and then have to run back to my phone every time a video ends. Not good ‚Äînot happy. This is not an IOS issue because it was doing this before I updated. In fact, I updated my phone because I thought it would resolve the problem. I keep trying to find solutions, but nothing has corrected something that was not an issue until now.

title: I FOUND A BUG PLEASE REPORT THIS TO THE DEVS!

title: There needs to be a way to tune search results.
text:
I watch ASMR videos pretty frequently, however when I search ASMR, I get results that are either videos I have already seen, a section that says ‚Äúchannels new to you‚Äù where it will be some of the most disgusting imagery I have ever seen on the platform. For example, it will be animations of people missing toes, bugs crawling out of skin, massive pimples and stuff being popped, holes on peoples skin, bones sticking out, super close up imagery of infected hairy armpits and other stuff like that. 

I have never interacted with these kinds of videos for the algorithm to realistically believe this is what I want to see. IT IS REVOLTING! Though since it doesn‚Äôt go against terms of service there is nothing I can do to keep from seeing it.

THERE NEEDS TO BE A WAY TO MAKE STUFF STOP SHOWING UP IN SEARCHES! Especially when stuff has nothing to do with what I‚Äôve searched or stuff I have ever interacted with.

title: They keep removing features making it worse
text:
This year, they moved the comments section on the iPad to the right hand side, leaving the space under the video as a completely useless dead space where nothing happens and instead covering all the suggested videos. Horrible design decision which makes me wonder if they even bothered testing it on iPad. 

Now they have removed the previous and next buttons. Now when I accidentally tap on a video in the sidebar, I cannot just tap previous to get back to the video I was watching, I have to exit the video, go to the history tab, and then chose the video I was watching. What was the purpose of removing this very useful feature? I am a premium user and I don‚Äôt know why we are paying just to be served an app that keeps having features removed (not to mention my favorite creators being demonetized and censored harder than ever) Very frustrating

title: A youtubers gripe
text:
Lack of freedom of speech. Cancel culture should not be allowed‚Ä¶ well. Ever! If you don‚Äôt like the content of the video, don‚Äôt watch it. It‚Äôs that easy. If you like the content of the video, like it and subscribe.

I want to tear down this division wall. It‚Äôs one side or the other. I don‚Äôt play into division. One person has an opinion that‚Äôs others. So what? I‚Äôve got friends that think one way that‚Äôs the opposite of mine but we all have common interests. We all have all different opinions on various subjects but we shouldn‚Äôt be divided over something isn‚Äôt going to matter to someone else. 

The only way we can unite is that we put away our differences and work TOGETHER for the greater good. We can only thrive if we stand together and stop talking about gun control and abortion. We all have something in common let‚Äôs start by canceling the cancel culture and let us live together as the way God designed it.

title: Lots of technical issues
text:
Now, I have to admit that I primarily use this app on a very old IPad, which probably contributes to the issues I‚Äôm dealing with, but I‚Äôm rating this based on my own experiences on the app and it would be dishonest to rate higher.
There is always some type of major glitch affecting the app; it tends to change randomly with updates. At one point it had a glitch where it would tell me I had lost my server connection when I hadn‚Äôt. Then that stopped happening and I got a glitch where the player would be stuck in fullscreen and the minimize buttons would no longer respond. Currently the glitch is that the screen will freeze for the first 5-10 seconds of a video, often with the video pitch black and with the audio playing fine. Most of the time it will unfreeze and continue playing the video. Sometimes it never unfreezes and the app crashes.

title: Refreshing comments each time a new ad is played
text:
I absolutely hate this new phenomenon on YT where I could have been reading the comments related to a particular video when suddenly an ad comes on.  YT will refresh the comments I‚Äôve been reading and then send me back to the very first comments that I had read 10 mins ago, effectively losing the particular comment I was reading.  I then have to scroll thru scores of comments to find the one I was reading before the system ‚Äúauto-refreshed‚Äù.  This sometimes happens over and over each time ads are played.  So annoying.

I still have YT 5 stars b/c I‚Äôve learned so much health and nutrition info, including great recipes with videos, over the last 3 months.  I‚Äôm much healthier now and am sharing this with my patients!

title: Playback Audio Issue
text: Up until now the slower playback speeds were working perfectly fine, and I would use the feature quite often because I find that it can actually greatly enhance the feeling/atmosphere of certain songs. But for some reason now when I try listening to anything at .75x speed there‚Äôs a robotic/metallic undertone to the audio, no matter the video. Going to .5x speed makes it even worse, to the point where I can‚Äôt even enjoy listening to the songs I‚Äôd normally listen to on this speed at all. I tried deleting and redownloading the app, but that didn‚Äôt help, so that leaves me to believe that this is a bug that needs to be fixed. Other than that the app is great, but I would really like to be able to listen to these songs again in the way that they mean the most to me. Hopefully this reaches someone, and if it does thank you!

title: Awesome app but too many adds
text: It‚Äôs an awesome app and there‚Äôs nothing really wrong with it but there‚Äôs so many ads like there‚Äôs one in every five minutes now it‚Äôs really annoying I used to think it was just a little thing for that one video I was trying to watch but then as I kept using the app I realized that there‚Äôs so many albums I started not to like it but it‚Äôs still a good app this is just not great like it intended to be I think it would be better if you guys updated it so there wouldn‚Äôt be as many ads like a three a video not like six adds a video and if you did it updated you guys would be the best app makers ever and just to let you know if you fixed it you would get a lot more people using the app

title: Great App with dumb design choices
text: If it ain‚Äôt broke, don‚Äôt fix it. Why why WHY did they feel the need to move the comments above the related videos? They KNEW this would throw people off because they have to put in a reminder that ‚Äúcomments have moved‚Äù, yeah WHY? And to make it worse, the comments are part of another ‚Äúlayer‚Äù so if you‚Äôre inside of a reply and you instinctively go for the X to close it out, it just closes you out of the entire comments section. STUPID. It‚Äôs just stupid little design choices the developers make upset the flow and usage of the app. No dedicated tab at the bottom for your own channel? Scrolling through a channels video tab sometimes doesn‚Äôt load past the first set? This is one of the largest companies on the planet with a powerful set of a tools and an immense staff, fix the little things please.

title: recommendations are stupid.
text:
I watched two vine compilations and ONE AlbertsStuff video. Now, my recommendations are piled with dead vines and Roblox videos. There‚Äôs not even videos from my subscriptions, which is just dumb, I should say. I always click ‚ÄúI am uninterested‚Äù but they never get deleted.
Do you people even listen to the reviews? You still have horrible reviews from two years ago. You keep adding new, unnecessary stuff, yet you guys don‚Äôt fix the vital issues that were probably there from 2 years ago. I hate to support this app but this is the only video app I prefer to watch from, because it‚Äôs the most popular, unfortunately. Don‚Äôt expect me to buy any apps or merch from this company until you get more satisfied customers. I only gave you two stars because I feel bad for all of you and your incompetence.
Once you fix these stupid bugs I will gladly give you 5 stars. Stop adding unneeded features and LISTEN TO THE PEOPLE THAT GIVE YOU MONEY.

title: Can‚Äôt stand the YT Shorts spam in my feed
text: YT keeps getting more annoying. If you‚Äôve used the app for any amount of time it becomes obvious that the ‚ÄúShorts People Also Watched‚Äù sections that show up in your feed are advertising which is completely unrelated to the types of videos you watch. I never watch Shorts, and it‚Äôs frustrating that I can‚Äôt turn them off. But it‚Äôs completely infuriating that YT bombards me with Shorts that are mostly half-naked women! And if it‚Äôs not that, it‚Äôs violence or making fun of people. And it won‚Äôt even give me the option to say ‚ÄúNot Interested‚Äù on them. It will even show you videos from channels you have blocked with the ‚ÄúDo Not Recommend Channel‚Äù option. The ‚ÄúPeople Also Watched‚Äù section that you get in search results also shows you annoying videos from channels you‚Äôve blocked. I‚Äôve paid for YT Premium for years, but it‚Äôs time to cancel. It‚Äôs not OK to fill my feed with ads when I‚Äôm paying to remove ads!

title: ughhhhhh again?
text: why is it always necessary to completely change everything on this app? i do not understand the need to completely upholster the UI every couple months forcing your audience to get used to everything all over again. i can no longer swipe down out of videos to continue to look around the app. i now have to stop the video, find the tiny little MINUSCULE down arrow in the corner and precisely tap it to minimize the video that i am watching. ALSO the removal of the oldest to newest video sorter‚Ä¶. literally just changing things for no good reason. WHYYYY is it your goal to make every UI update on this app even worse than the last?!? i truly do not understand it. PS: the rounder format is not cute. PUT IT BACK

title: This is amazing!
text: I love it but sometimes I wish that it would show the likes by default and not have to make you turn them on. And as a small content creator, this app gives me a lot of happiness to create and entertain fans all around the world. I would recommend for people under and over 18. It‚Äôs a more child friendly app for children and family. Although being a content creator as small as I am, you will face more challenges then you think because you would get more hate because not many people know you and wouldn‚Äôt care to defend you. My goal isn‚Äôt to hit 100k or anything but I would at least like to hit 700 subs before the end of the month. 5 star app definitely recommend.

title: Usually great, but I think I ran into a bug.
text:
I recently got a free trial of the Premium and love it so far, but it seems that I can‚Äôt use one of the coolest features: Picture in Picture. Don‚Äôt get me wrong, it USED TO work, and i could watch my videos while doing other things, big no more.
It doesn‚Äôt appear as an option in the app nor can I fix it in my settings (I use a fairly new iPhone 13, btw, currently on iOS 15.5). The weirdest thing about it is that my sister CAN use it, and her phone is an iPhone 8.
An IPHONE EIGHT that she‚Äôs had for a few years, and she can use PiP, but I can‚Äôt on my not even a half year old iPhone 13?!
Someone explain how that makes sense, please? Or at least fix this glitch before my premium trial expires?!

title: Why did you move the comment section?
text: I‚Äôm fine with the app. The algorithm is kind of bad and it always demonetizes and copyright strikes videos for silly reasons, but that isn‚Äôt why I‚Äôm writing this. The comment section has moved and I don‚Äôt know why? I was just watching a video and the comments were in they‚Äôre usual spot, but I clicked on another video, and the comments suddenly moved to right under the video? I don‚Äôt like this change at all and it makes me extremely uncomfortable. Please change this back. You can just completely modify something like this so suddenly after so many years of it being the same. I‚Äôm so used to scrolling to the bottom and I‚Äôm completely fine with it. Was there a mass of people who wanted this change? I honestly don‚Äôt see a reason to change that so I would really appreciate it if you changed them back. Thank you.

title: Great App - Needs 2 Important changes
text: I use this app all the time and I love it. That being said, there are 2 major things I would like to see fixed. First, I would like to be able to have a search box when I‚Äôm looking at a specific channel, so I don‚Äôt have to search through all of YT for that channel‚Äôs specific video. It can even be a lot just to search through that channel‚Äôs content for an older video, let alone the entire platform. Second, I would appreciate it if YT didn‚Äôt restart so frequently, causing me to lose my place in my video, even after navigating away from the app after just a few minutes. I‚Äôve taken to adding every video I don‚Äôt finish right away to the Watch Later list, which is a bit annoying. Other than that, I‚Äôm really liking all the recent updates and reorganization.

title: Playlists Don‚Äôt Work
text:
The app is usually fine but recently videos have not been added to playlists after hitting save. When I go back to the video to save again, it shows which playlist it‚Äôs already saved to. However, these videos do not show up on the playlists (which have less than 5000 videos, so it‚Äôs not hitting the capacity). I usually save videos to watch when I have more time, so not being able to do that makes the site temporarily useless for me. This problem is for both the mobile app and the desktop website.

I‚Äôm not sure if it‚Äôs on purpose to get more people to buy their queue feature, but even then how would I find videos to queue if I don‚Äôt remember what channel I saved a video from? ü§¶ Hope someone fixes this soon. Otherwise there‚Äôs better alternatives of long form content, which is unfair to the creators who rely on this site.

title: Terrible update

Also I hate how the nodifications when they go into the playlist things are from newest to oldest, making you unable to watch it from the oldest or beginning of a series to the end.
